logicDescription: Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (134442) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (134442) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history, with at least 365 days of prior continuous observation. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

cohortName: Localized Scleroderma or Morphea at first diagnosis
logicDescription: Scleroderma at first diagnosis with 365 days continuous observation. Cohort exit is the end of continuous observable time for the person.
Systemic sclerosis at first diagnosis at first diagnosis with 365 days continuous observation. Cohort exit is the end of continuous observable time for the person.

cohortName: Systemic sclerosis or or localized scleroderma at first diagnosis
logicDescription: Systemic sclerosis or Scleroderma at first diagnosis at first diagnosis with 365 days continuous observation. Cohort exit is the end of continuous observable time for the person.
